definition: see 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Jade and Alan are on the phone.

definition: a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
to appreciate/to take pleasure in/to enjoy
scholar's rock (one of the naturally-eroded, fantastically-shaped rocks put on display indoors or in gardens in China)
recreative seal, bearing not the owner's name but a well-known verse or such, and used for artistic purposes on paintings etc
